name: Me
description:
This is my first ever finished project and my first ever game jam.

"Me" - Weekly Game Jam 148: Mirror

A story of a young kid and a day in her life that impacts everything.

Dev's note:

I'm sorry that the game have no sounds at all and the title screen sucks. I kinda rushed it. Maybe I'll update to make it look better.

Disclaimer: This game contains act of bullying and suicidal thoughts. If you are under 15, please have your parent or guardian accompanying you.
